version_description:
3.1.2 Fix a crasher during photo import.
3.1.0:
Show total time span of a project on album cover. (x years y months z days)
Show total number of photos on album cover.
Correct starting time of a project in week/day display mode. Some cases negative days/weeks would show before.
Some UI tweaks, larger image size. Extra album/photo stats analytics. Update outdate libraries.
A remote configured feed system.
Handle incorrect EXIF/TIFF date format when importing.
Fixed an issue where albums don't show on iOS 9/10 with smaller phone screens (iPhone 4/5/5s).
Add tens & hundreds photos at a time from your camera roll (iPhone photos library) with multiple selections.
Add tens & hundreds photos at a time from your camera roll (iPhone photos library) with multiple selections.
Camera roll photos are saved to specific albums. Taking photos with hardware buttons.

3D force touch on the icon to take a picture directly without launching the app.
Fixed a bug in capture photo with volume buttons.
Added camera timer. Take photos with count down!
Privacy locked album! Unlock your private albums with FaceID or TouchID!
Fix a crasher when exporting videos due to incorrect aspect ratio settings.
We fixed a tricky memory leak bug.
